data.text:
Charles Haskell Hutton, Jr., son of Charles Haskell Hutton and Elfriede Elisabeth Ramseier Hutton, was born March 6, 1935 in Oakland, California.

He departed this life Saturday, September 27, 2014 in Humansville, Missouri at the age of 79 years, 6 months and 19 days.

Charlie served in the United States Army from April 1953 to February 1956. He was united in marriage to Katherine Sue Hughes on November 22, 1956 and to this union ten children were born.

He was preceded in death by his parent; a son, William Danial Hutton, and one sister, Lilli Loebach.

He is survived by three sons: Chuck Hutton and his wife, Brenda of Mansfield, David Hutton and his wife, Kathy of Lebanon, Chris Hutton and his wife, Michelle of Rogersville; six daughters: Janalyn Edmonds and her husband, Gerald of Mansfield, Jackie Green of Bolivar, Charlotte Still and her husband, Greg of Grovespring, Carol Spencer and her husband, Earl of Norwood, Nancy Still and her husband, Robby of Grovespring, Tracy Ward and her husband Ty of Trophy Club, Texas; one brother, Emil Richard “Dickie” Hutton of Marshfield; two sisters: June Bass of Marshfield and Linda Yeubanks of Macon, MO; 24 grandchildren, 13 great-grandchildren, as well as several nieces , nephews and other relatives.

Visitation will be held at Greenlawn Funeral Home North on Thursday October 2, 2014 from 6:00 t0 8:00 p.m. Graveside Services will take place at 16th Cemetery South of Marshfield on Friday at 10:00 a.m. Services have been entrusted to Greenlawn Funeral Home North, Springfield, MO. Online condolences may be made at www.greenlawnfuneralhome.com.
